## Example Dashboard

```{python}
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
from plotnine import ggplot, aes, geom_point, geom_boxplot, theme_minimal, labs

# Load example dataset from seaborn
df = sns.load_dataset("penguins")

# Define theme
theme = theme_minimal(18)

def plot_flipper_length_vs_body_mass(df):
    return (
        ggplot(df, aes(x="flipper_length_mm", y="body_mass_g", color="species")) +
        geom_point() +
        theme +
        labs(x="Flipper Length (mm)", y="Body Mass (g)", title="Flipper Length vs Body Mass by Species")
    )

def plot_species_distribution(df):
    return (
        ggplot(df, aes(x="species", y="body_mass_g", fill="species")) +
        geom_boxplot() +
        theme +
        labs(x="Species", y="Body Mass (g)", title="Body Mass Distribution by Species")
    )

def table_summary(df):
    return df.groupby("species")["body_mass_g"].describe().reset_index()
```

```{python}
#| tags: [parameters]
# Default species filter
species_filter = "Adelie"
```

# Penguins Dataset Visualization

## Row {height="60%"}

```{python}
#| title: Flipper Length vs Body Mass
plot_flipper_length_vs_body_mass(df)
```

```{python}
#| title: Body Mass Distribution by Species
plot_species_distribution(df)
```

## Row

